title: $:/plugins/tg/prettylink-button

name: Pretty link button
readme:
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" style="overflow: hidden;white-space: pre;width: 100%;" message="tm-open-external-window" param="http://www.tongerner.nl/TW5/TW5_index.html">{{$:/core/images/github}} <$text text="http://www.tongerner.nl/TW5/TW5_index.html"/> \define icn(icon) \end A button (<>) for the Editor toolbar that applies a 'pretty link' to the selected text 'abc' (`[[link|abc]]`)
Assigned shortcut: {{$:/config/shortcuts/prettylink}}
